alert.note: Alert for Helena Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 11 at 2:40PM MDT until April 14 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM WEDNESDAY TO MIDNIGHT MDT THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches. * WHERE...Helena Valley. * WHEN...From 6 PM Wednesday to Midnight MDT Thursday Night. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Travel could be difficult and visibility at times could be below one half mile. Isolated power outages possible due to the heavy wet snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Impacts will be greatest during the nighttime and early morning periods.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
